inclusion.criterion: Patients diagnosed as acute appendicitis cases according to clinical (preoperative and peroperative) and preoperative laboratory findings and imaging modalities (ultrasound, computed tomography), and pathologic results
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients who were operated by the same surgical team of the Kahramanmaras Sutcu Imam University Hospital.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Negative appendectomies according to peroperative findings and pathologic findins
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients whose data were not available
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients who were operated by the other surgical team of the Kahramanmaras Sutcu Imam University.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: 17-year-old boy with severe migratory pain in right lower quadrant of abdomen, nausea and vomiting. Elevated WBC with dominant neutrophils. CT scan showed acute perforated appendicitis.
